data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 11,736 believers in the county of Golaghat to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Golaghat, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Golaghat access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Golaghat, Assam, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Golaghat, Assam, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Patni (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Patni (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Golaghat, Assam, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Golaghat, Assam, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,055,164 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the county of Golaghat, Assam, India has a population of 1,066,900.

We estimate Golaghat has 11,736 people who might know Jesus, 12,945 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,042,219 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Golaghat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
